result.execSummary:
The defendant Jerrick L. Smith was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jerrick L. Smith is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jerrick L. Smith was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: With Huber privileges  -  Court costs are to be collected during probation in 14CF1197

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jerrick L. Smith

records.addlTxt: Ct. 2
Ct. 1

Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney K Watson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Court imposes sentence of 6 months jail w/Huber privileges, credit for 1 day served; deft to report to jail on 11/12/16 at 6pm; costs ordered; deft to pay $200 DNA surcharge; to be paid during period of probation in 14CF1197.

Defendant, Jerrick L. Smith, appeared with Attorney Kristyne Alicen Watson.  Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk:  JM.
MINUTES:  14CF1197 & 15CF733:  No Record.  Sentencing Hearing set over to November 3, 2016 at 03:30 pm due to court calendar conjestion.
With Atty Watson and by agreement of ADA Drees and Judge Wagner the SEH of 9/19/16 at 2pm is rescheduled; as Atty Watson is unable to appear; reset to 10/14/16 at 10:30am.

Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney K Watson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Watson requests to adjourn SEH as she has not had opportunity to meet w/deft to go over PSI.  SEH is adjourned to 9/19/16 at 2pm.  Bond continued.
With Atty Watson and by agreement of ADA Drees the SEH of 8/29/16 at 2:30pm is rescheduled, as the deft will be on a pre-planned vacation; reset to 9/2/16 at 9:15am.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney K Watson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  On State's motion, ct 2 is dismissed.  Deft pleads guilty.  Court finds deft guilty.  PSI ordered.  DNA sample ordered.  SEH 8/29/16 at 2:30pm.  Bond continued.
Atty:  K Watson.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney C Lassiter.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Case set for jury selection.  Due to another case proceeding to trial on this date the court adjourns the JS to 6/27/16 at 8:30am.  Bond continued.
State's List of Witnesses and Demand for Discovery - filed by ADA, Carli McNeill  kmk
Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney C Lassiter.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  JS set for 11/30/15 at 8:30am.  Bond continued.

Defendant, Jerrick L. Smith, appeared with Attorney Carmen L. Lassiter.  Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk: N. Jurgens. 
MINUTES:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found. Bound over to Br 6.  Information filed, reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered. Bond continued. Matter trails DE's other files.  Status conference scheduled for October 15, 2015 at 01:15 pm.

ADA Richard Wells.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Kristine Watson.  Clk  NJurgens.  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 20 days; set before Commissioner on 9/1/15 @ 10 a.m.  Bond - continued.  Deft waives time limits; Atty Lassiter out sick, Prelim Hearing date arranged with her via email.
Preliminary hearing at 09-01-2015 10:00 am

Attorney Kristyne Watson appeared for Attorney Carmen L. Lassiter .  Attorney Jennifer Ann Phan appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk: N. Jurgens. 
MINUTES: DE did not appear; no explaination for his non-appearance. The clerk called DE who said he did not know about today's hearing; matter adjourned to 1:00 pm.  Status conference scheduled for August 19, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
